edu.ohiou.labimp.gtk3d
Class Line3d

java.lang.Object
  edu.ohiou.labimp.basis.ViewObject
      edu.ohiou.labimp.draw.ImpObject
          edu.ohiou.labimp.gtk3d.Line3d
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable2D, Viewable, Drawable3D, DrawableWF, java.io.Serializable
public class Line3d
extends ImpObject

Class that represents infinite 3d line (line is 3d euclidean space The class is represented by its point and direction vector

See Also:
Serialized Form

intersectLinePlane

public javax.vecmath.Point3d intersectLinePlane(Plane inPlane)
                                         throws InvalidIntersectionException,
                                                NotUniqueValueException
Returns the point of intersection between "this" line and plane. This method calls its counterpart in Plane class

Parameters:
inPlane - - plane whose interscetion point with line is sought
Returns:
Point3d of the intersection or null if intersectino does not exist i.e. line and plane are parallel
Throws:
InvalidIntersectionException
NotUniqueValueException
